text: Pxr Filmic Tone Mapper Sample Filter
Pxr Filmic Tone Mapper Sample Filter shader
Represents the Pxr Filmic Tone Mapper Sample Filter shader (PxrFilmicToneMapperSampleFilter) for RenderMan’s RIS rendering mode.
Please see the Users' Guide section of the RenderMan Documentation for details.
